item.title: メモ：NYSEがAudacyの取引を停止し、低価格のため上場廃止の手続きを開始すると伝え、Audacyは上訴する予定で、株式はOTC取引される（インサイドラジオ）
item.description:
Inside Radio:
Memo: the NYSE halts trading in Audacy and tells the company it will begin delisting steps due to low price; Audacy plans to appeal, and shares will trade OTC  —  Trading of Audacy's stock was abruptly halted shortly after 2pm today on the New York Stock Exchange.

item.title: 100人以上のジャーナリストや編集者が、香港に元Apple Daily発行人のジミー・ライの釈放を求める書簡に署名、彼は英国の弁護士を使うことを妨害されている（Amy Hawkins/The Guardian）
item.description:
Amy Hawkins / The Guardian:
Over 100 journalists and editors sign a letter calling for Hong Kong to release former Apple Daily publisher Jimmy Lai; he's been blocked from using a UK lawyer  —  Leading global media figures among signatories backing publisher, hit with wave of ‘lawfare’ including legislation to stop him hiring UK barrister

item.title: Rumbleが、ポッドキャスティングとライブストリーミングアプリのCallinを買収したと発表、Callinの共同設立者David SacksはRumbleの取締役会に参加する（Bill Peters/MarketWatch)
item.description:
Bill Peters / MarketWatch:
Rumble says it has acquired podcasting and livestreaming app Callin, and Callin's co-founder David Sacks will join Rumble's board of directors  —  'I strongly support Rumble's unwavering commitment to free speech in the face of growing censorship and government overreach,' Sacks says in plans to join right-wing video platform

item.title: The Messengerのコンテンツを分析すると、英国のタブロイド紙のような記事が掲載され、傍線は明らかに男性が圧倒的に多い（Joshua Benton/Nieman Lab）。
item.description:
Joshua Benton / Nieman Lab:
A quick analysis of The Messenger's content shows an outlet with stories that resemble those from a British tabloid, with bylines apparently overwhelmingly male  —  The new site from the former owner of The Hill — backed by $50 million — feels like a remnant of an earlier age.

item.title: 元NFLパンターのパット・マカフィーが4年間$120M FanDuelとの契約を破棄し、番組をESPN、ESPN+、ESPNのYouTubeチャンネルに移し、秋にスタートする予定（Andrew Marchand/New York Post)
item.description:
Andrew Marchand / New York Post:
Former NFL punter Pat McAfee breaks his four-year $120M FanDuel contract to move his show to ESPN, ESPN+, and ESPN's YouTube channel, set to start in the fall  —  “The Pat McAfee Show” is moving to ESPN in a multimillion-dollar deal that he is expected to begin in the fall, The Post has learned.

item.title: Dotdash Meredith、ウェブサイトから収集した匿名化されたユーザーデータの集合体に基づいて広告主がユーザーをターゲットにできるクッキーレス広告ツール「D/Cipher」をデビュー（Sara Fischer/Axios）。
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Dotdash Meredith debuts D/Cipher, a cookie-less ad tool that lets advertisers target users based on aggregate, anonymized user data collected from its websites  —  Dotdash Meredith, one of the largest internet publishers in the country, will debut a new ad targeting tool called D/Cipher …

item.title: 35年以上の経験を持つNPRの外国人記者3人が、女性特派員であること、国際報道はどう変わったか、などについてQ&Aを発表（Sitara Nieves/Poynter)
item.description:
Sitara Nieves / Poynter:
Q&A with three departing NPR foreign reporters with 35+ years of experience, on being female correspondents, how international reporting has changed, and more  —  Women correspondents with a combined 114 years of experience depart after recent budget cuts

item.title: Tencent Music、第1四半期の売上高は前年同期比5.4％増の〜10.2億ドル、音楽配信の売上高は同30.4％増の〜3.78億ドル、加入者数は同17.7％増の94.4万人 (Elizabeth Dilts Marshall/Billboard)
item.description:
Elizabeth Dilts Marshall / Billboard:
Tencent Music reports Q1 revenue up 5.4% YoY to ~$1.02B, revenue from music subscriptions up 30.4% YoY to ~$378M, and subscribers up 17.7% YoY to 94.4M  —  China's leading music streaming company reports a 34% increase in revenue from music subscriptions.  —  China's Tencent Music Entertainment Group …

item.title: CNETの従業員は、WGA Eastで〜100人のライター、編集者、その他のコンテンツクリエーターを代表する組合を結成し、経営陣に任意承認を求める（Josh Eidelson/Bloomberg)
item.description:
Josh Eidelson / Bloomberg:
CNET employees seek to form a union representing ~100 writers, editors, and other content creators with WGA East and ask management for voluntary recognition  —  CNET journalists are pushing to unionize, seeking a formal say on issues including the use of artificial intelligence at the technology-news company.

item.title: 情報筋の話：Austin Russellは$656MのForbes買収に$10Mを投資する予定、残りはSun Group、2人のビジネスマン、GSVが見つけた投資家から（Sara Fischer/Axios)
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
Sources: Austin Russell plans to invest $10M in the $656M Forbes acquisition; the rest will come from Sun Group, two businessmen, and investors that GSV finds  —  Austin Russell, the 28-year-old American CEO of electric vehicle tech company Luminar Technologies, plans to put in only $10 million …

item.title: 2023年のトニー賞は、ブロードウェイの重要なマーケティング機会であるが、WGAが式典のピケをしないと言ったため、形を変えて予定通り行われる（ニューヨーク・タイムズ）。
item.description:
New York Times:
2023's Tony Awards, a key Broadway marketing opportunity, will proceed as scheduled, in an altered form, after the WGA said the union won't picket the ceremony  —  The Tony Awards, a key marketing opportunity for Broadway, can go ahead in an altered form after the striking screenwriters' union …

item.title: Apple、新しいコンサート発見機能を展開、Apple Musicで一部のアーティストのSet Lists、Apple Mapsで一部の都市の地元会場へのGuidesなど（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）。
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
Apple rolls out new concert discovery features, including Set Lists in Apple Music for select artists and Guides to local venues in Apple Maps for select cities  —  Apple is bringing concert discovery to two of its flagship apps, Apple Music and Apple Maps, the company announced today.

item.title: 情報源: 一握りのFoxキャスターがタッカー・カールソンに接触し、契約が終了したら彼が近々立ち上げるTwitterベンチャーに参加することに興味を示している (Tatiana Siegel/Variety)
item.description:
Tatiana Siegel / Variety:
Sources: a handful of Fox anchors have reached out to Tucker Carlson to express interest in joining his forthcoming Twitter venture once their contracts are up  —  On April 26, Carlson spoke by phone with one of Fox Corp.'s eight board members, who told the host that his recent benching …

item.title: マネーロンダリング事件で、英国の裁判官はBBCがトーリーの寄付者Javad Marandiの身元を明らかにできると裁定、プライバシー法が強化される中、報道の自由のマイルストーンとなる (BBC)
item.description:
BBC:
In a money laundering case, UK judges rule the BBC could reveal the identity of Tory donor Javad Marandi, a press freedom milestone amid tightening privacy laws  —  A top businessman whose foreign companies were part of a global money laundering investigation is a major donor to the Conservative Party.

item.title: Black Music Action Coalitionが発表した、音楽業界の人種的不公平への対応に関する2022年のレポートカードでは、一部の音楽レーベルに懸念が示されています（Elias Leight/Billboard)
item.description:
Elias Leight / Billboard:
The Black Music Action Coalition's 2022 report card on the music industry's progress toward addressing racial inequity expresses concern over some music labels  —  The Black Music Action Coalition (BMAC) unveiled a tepid assessment of the music industry's progress toward addressing historical racism and inequity on Monday (May 15).
